website_summaries.verdict: Great for musty closets and deodorizing smaller rooms, and its fan runs quietly.
pros: Clears the air in most rooms within 30 minutes
Chemical-like ozone odor is not overwhelming and clears quickly
cons: Fan may begin to buzz over time

customer_reviews.title: Great ozone generator! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I own two of the units, one in the living room and one in the bedroom. Your brand was recommended to me by a friend. It’s quiet and leaves the room feeling fresh and the air cleaner. I like the option of 30 minutes or leaving on all the time. You can tell it’s running by the slight ozone smell, but it’s not overpowering like other units. It’s also compact and the blue light lets you know it’s working. I’m suffering from cancer and these units help me breath the fresh air better. I highly recommend these units.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier about how well this worked. I got it to handle some pet odors that other methods weren't entirely getting rid of. It did the trick! After buying it, I did come across some articles about health concerns about using these, even when used in unoccupied rooms. The articles seemed to be based more on people running them constantly or using industrial strength machines. I am not overly concerned about using it for 30 minutes or less and letting the room air out before going back into it, per the manufacturer's instructions. I will probably err on the side of caution and not use it every day like I had originally planned, though.
customer_reviews.author: Glenshee Fairy

customer_reviews.title: Works while I am gone and shuts itself off.
customer_reviews.text: The best part of this is the 30 minute timer. I can get my dogs and myself out of the room, hit the button and I know it will work for 30 minutes and be done before I come back in. It has helped with the doggy odors. You can definitely smell a difference in the air. It is very compact, so does not take up a lot of space. I just leave it plugged in, but it is not on until I push the button. It lights up to show that it is working. It is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Saves marriages
customer_reviews.text: Bought the husband Poo-pourii... He never remembers to use it. I had given up and conceded defeat to the odors in our bathroom. Now I tap the button on this device when he's done, and the room is deoderized in a few minutes. I like the auto shut off feature, because constant ozone production would concern me (for obvious reasons). Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Margarita R.

customer_reviews.title: ... this product for 1 week and so far so good. The only issue so far is that I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this product for 1 week and so far so good. The only issue so far is that I wish I could control the amount of ozone that is being used. A dial that lowers or increases the ozone as in other models would be useful as I can sometimes smell too much coming from the unit. UPDATE I've had this purifier for 1 1/2 months and it now is not cleaning the air as before. I smell more odors and less clean air. Unfortunately this doesn't last. I wish it did because it was great when it was new.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of marijuana smell from roommate
customer_reviews.text: I love this little box. My roommate is a pot head and smokes in her room but it comes thru the vents into my room well I’m not a pot head so this device has saved her from getting cussed out. It eliminates the smell completely In 30-1hr depending on how much she smokes. We have carpet so it’s a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Removed moldy damp smells from paper easily in 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: I collect vintage sewing patterns and occasionally they come from storage in damp environments. You know that been in the basement too long smell -- tried it out on a few patterns in a small box -- 30 minutes and the smell was gone. A bit of ozone smell leftover but I'm sure that will eventually go away. This is the first day I've used it, if anything changes I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product for the price! In less than 24 hours, it was able to clean and freshen the air in our home and rid our house of musty odors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This ozone fan works very well for eliminating the smell of cigarette smoke and just about any other odors like just typical stale are from keeping the Windows shut in the winter. It leaves the room smelling fresh like after a rainstorm, I love it. I would heed the advice though and let the air refresh in the room after running it so that you're not breathing in Ozone.
customer_reviews.author: Trishakers

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have a larger one for blasting the house. This one is perfect and can be used with the door closed to a room. Takes a few minutes for the smell to start which lets you know the device is pushing out what it is supposed to. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kemal Miller

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 11 months.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a pair of these Oct 2017. One unit stopped working Sept. 2018. E-mailed "ask a question" due to the fact that there seems to be no way to contact the mfg'r - no response. Tried the listed mfg'r contact with no response.
customer_reviews.author: Surfer

customer_reviews.title: I think it works greaf
customer_reviews.text: Has helped tremendously with the lively "perfume" my princess puppy has left in my hallway. The scent that NOTHING can touch. Literally nothing. I have sensitive nose from migraines and steam clean the carpet about every 6 weeks and use febreeze and deodorizer, and let specific cleaners. This has been the most helpful for in between cleaning. I do vacuum multiple times throughout the week as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I keep in laundry room where litter ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I keep in laundry room where litter box is located. My kitty doesn't always COVER his deposits, so i'll just tap this button and POOF....clears the air until i can clean the box!
customer_reviews.author: KatC

customer_reviews.title: Knocks out pet odors and more
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I use it in the area of my home where the litter box is and only use on the timer . It really knocks out any odor and makes the air clean. I plan to purchase a couple more. I gave some as gifts for Christmas as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: It has worked just as I thought it would. The reason I didn't give it an over all 5 is, it turns off after 30 min, Just wish it would have a timer to turn back on. We have 3 dogs with all the rain this year the house gets a little wet dog smell. When I turn on it disappears entirely and stays gone. Gives the air a very clean sent. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: carol r.

customer_reviews.title: Used for a home sanitizing rig
customer_reviews.text: In the CoVid days, one issue is introducing the virus from outside of the house, packages, shoes, masks, clothes, etc. Like many Prime customers, I have an assortment of cardboard boxes and use one that's about 18'x 30" x 20" and whether fabric, cardboard, or plastic, a 30 min blast of ozone appears to do the trick for sanitizing the item.
customer_reviews.author: jemphd

customer_reviews.title: Better than Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Concerns that such a small, inexpensive unit could "do the job" were completely unfounded and we are SO PLEASED with the One Earth ozone air purifier. Almost instantaneous "clean" ozone smell in a basement store room replaced the musty odor. Quiet, efficient and cost-effective - can't ask more than that :)
customer_reviews.author: Teresa and Bob Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be working fine but having said that I don't think it is whisper quiet as they said. The noise isn't so loud that you wouldn't use it but it does make a faint noise. Also, I do smell something coming out of it. Again, not enough not to use it. I have these things all over my house and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Maryellen E. Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these devices on the advice of one of my doctors. I have been moving it from room to room and it does remove odors, even in a room with two litter boxes. I'm hoping this indicates it is inactivating mold and bacteria, which is what my doctor is hoping. I hope to purchase another soon so I don't have to move this one around as much. I've only been using it for a little over a week, but it's been running non-stop. There is a slight odor with use. I find the unit to be fairly quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G

customer_reviews.title: Loud and Inefficient, all for under $50!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first Ozone generator I ever purchased (on 1/31/2019), and looking back, I regret it. It isn't bad, but your money would go to better use by purchasing a Concise air ionizer, or, dare I say it... an Envion Ionic Pro. If you want to put this device in a small room (i.e bathroom) or where a litter box is, then it will work just fine, and the 30 minute timer is helpful. However, I highly suggest you look elsewhere for something less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Does the kid!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the office. Minimal sound, barely notable. Took a bit to figure out how to set the timer but if I read the directions it would have been much easier!
customer_reviews.author: marian

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Love the 30 min timer
customer_reviews.text: My huge closet does not have any type of air circulation. Stinky shoes and dirty laundry scents no longer linger. I ordered this to use for bad smells and pet accident smells that I can’t get rid of in an enclosed area(my closet). I push the button each morning before I leave the house.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mickelson

customer_reviews.title: timer works great
customer_reviews.text: I had to order another after my StepFather got a whiff of this, and they are sold out presently. Another product seems more powerful, level of output can be adjusted, yet I liked the push timer on the front. the other does not have this. I had to trade my Dad for this and send him back home with that! So when they get more I assume many of us will get them again.
customer_reviews.author: tim gilbert

customer_reviews.title: I use this OZONE GENERATOR to sterilize my CPAP
customer_reviews.text: You can spend well over $200 for products that exactly the same thing. I cut off the plastic end of a CPAP hose and epoxied to this ozone generator. I connect the CPAP hose once a week turn it on for 30 minutes. TAH DAH!
customer_reviews.author: Jetter

customer_reviews.title: Smell comes back
customer_reviews.text: Bought a camper with some water damage and the musty moldy odor to go with. Price was good so it was an I’ll fix it later deal. Have ran this unit for hours on end and once the ozone odor clears it still has the musty smell, although somewhat improved. Will continue running unit and update as I go. For now I’m not terribly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Super way to a fresh closet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use to freshen my walk in closet in Florida. My clothes sometimes smelled just a touch stale and using this refreshened everything. The closet does not have a vent and does not get fresh air so this was the perfect solution. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LBR

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: So I mean I live in a college dorm, two dude lots of stinky stuff and we just set the timer once a day and all the girls say our room smells the best of anyones
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Derkin

customer_reviews.title: Item does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I placed the unit in my 300sqft basement I used it for a few days and can’t tell any difference in the smell of the air. After the static smell goes away the room smells just like it did before. Did not work as advertised at all. I will be requesting a refund. Very disappointed. Box said it would cover up tp 500sqft. No way.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: NO house Odor!
customer_reviews.text: Completely eliminates stale odor in home. I move from one room to the next during the week, each day. Close the door and walk away.
customer_reviews.author: Lee McMorries

customer_reviews.title: product does not last
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this ozone generator on October 15th, 2019, the description indicated lifetime warranty. The unit worked fine, but the ozone production has been slowly decreased, and has completely stopped now on February 5th 2020. When the units produces ozone, there is a unique "sweet" smell. That's how I know it works. Now this "sweet" smell is no more. That's how I know it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: ToThi

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: So far - its working great! I thought Id give it a test on the worst room - - THE SMOKING ROOM. To my surprise - It did not give a hint of smoke-scent when I arrived home. Very pleased so far
customer_reviews.author: wanda

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Placed it right next to the litter box. The 30 min timer keeps the house from being overcome by scent of ozone. The cats don't seem to mind. Probably would work near any areas with scent areas.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE M

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Have not had the two units I ordered for very long but they are easy to use and seem to handle the job well. The ozone produced is noticeable in the room in which they operate and as instructed, we normally leave the room during the 30 minute operation cycle. So far, I am very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd W Boeke

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I love this fry fish and the odor is gone in hours Also when I get up in the morning and go in my kitchen it smell fresh . I ordered one for my kids room and it takes away odor from shoes and smelly clothes . I highly recommend wish I could RATE a10
customer_reviews.author: Muddduck

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Very effective eliminating odors and effects of allergies. I use it for single rooms, close door and reopen after about 40 minutes, then move to another room, to clean whole house. Timer works perfectly for getting back in the room. Also use for travel in hotel rooms, for oder/allergy/anti-viral properties. Small enough to fit in travel bag. Great product, more powerful than most outlet type generators. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! When it works. It was only operational two times then quit working. They did refund promptly. I ordered another. I hope this one works. They are really great when they work. I ordered two more recently. They seem to work well at the moment. Next time I may order a more expensive model hoping for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing little machine!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered one of these for our laundry room, which is also where our dog sleeps. In an hour, all dog smells vanished. We unplugged, took to our cruising boat and it freshened up each room as we made the rounds with it. We purchased as second on to keep on the boat, so we are totally covered now. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Greg C.

customer_reviews.title: Makes a smell.
customer_reviews.text: While this may work fine, as it says in the instructions, it will leave a smell in the room. Well, it does. This smell makes me cough, so I don't use it much.
customer_reviews.author: James D Krise

customer_reviews.title: Would I buy it again? I did.
customer_reviews.text: After trying the first unit I decided that it did what it's designed to do. It did it well enough that I bought a second one. The fan sound is low enough that it never becomes an issue. I don't use the timer function but instead use it on a smart plug with a timing routine through a Echo unit.
customer_reviews.author: Preston W. Vallie

customer_reviews.title: Takes the smells away so well that I just purchased another one today..!
customer_reviews.text: So far seems to work well. I like the smell it emits. I do believe it is taking the cigarette smells out fairly well. In fact, today I purchased another unit. I want one for the living room and the kitchen..! I give this item 10+ stars..!!
customer_reviews.author: Paula P

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: Update from my initial one star review. After posting the review below, the company shipped me a replacement unit free of charge. It was unexpected and much appreciated. The replacement unit has worked great, and I recommend the product on its own merits and the great customer service. Bought this item in mid-March 2019. It was great, and I would've given it 5 stars, but it stopped working a week ago. Deader than dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C. Gearhardt

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a wool coat that has been packed away.It smelled musty,I hung the coat on the shower rod in our small bathroom & ran the unit for 2 hours.Musty smell is gone ! The odor gives me a headache,other than that its a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Howes

customer_reviews.title: We feel that this is a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. We keep it in a room with a cats box. It had kind of a metallic smell at first but that has gone away. We feel that this is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W.

customer_reviews.title: A simple yet effective way to resolve in home smoke and smell issues...
customer_reviews.text: The RC-30 ozone generator worked better than expected. I don't worry about offending my neighbors anymore because I can simply press the button and the ozone generator does the rest. I very much recommend this to anyone with smoke or smell issues in their home.
customer_reviews.author: steven mann

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly suited for home use
customer_reviews.text: Having been in the disaster clean up and recover industry for short time, I learned to respect the ability of Ozone for many purposes. This machine did its job and I love the timer function. Perfect for bed rooms or even larger family rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is small and plugs directly into a regular wall outlet. Due to the size I was apprehensive that it would do the job. Pleasantly suprised that it work very well in eliminating odors in our motor home. Small in size, mighty in power.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Removes cooking odors quickly👍
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the timer function. We use it in the kitchen. Cooking fish in our air fryer creates a strong odor and this little device can remove it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: John L Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Listen I don't write too many reviews but this spray is the truth!! I'm a smoker and embarrassed to admit that I am one and I spray this all over my house with my ozone generator air purifier and when I tell you would never know that I smoked in here! I've been smoking more heavily since being in quarantine and you can't smell smoke at all in my place. Highly recommended definitely ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Porsha Corley

customer_reviews.title: It works awesome! It's pretty quiet and it makes my fairly ...
customer_reviews.text: It works awesome! It's pretty quiet and it makes my fairly large bathroom that has a high ceiling smell great. I sometimes smoke cigarettes in this room and it definitely does not smell like smoke!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Whelpley

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Runs quiet but I expect it to get louder over time, like fans usually do. I bought this one because the previous one did not have a timer. One day I forgot to turn it off, it ran for over 12 hours and died.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great air cleaner! I run it once or twice a day and the room is much fresher. I sleep better and no longer cough during the night. It’s quiet and relatively small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liked the first one and got a 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact ozone generator. When plugged in the cube only covers up 1 outlet which is nice. A single button press starts the unit to run for 30 minutes and then shuts off. So far used in a 10 ft. X 20 ft. room and the level of ozone generated is noticeable but not too strong. It is very quiet. Overall, a happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I just wish it would have came with a hose to make ozone water. It does work good for a small room.
customer_reviews.author: Mattg5271

customer_reviews.title: Broke almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: Broke within 24 hours. Used for 2 30 minute periods, then nothing. Returning for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: Bought an older hone that had a lot of wood in the closet that has a terrible smell that permiated anything in the closet. The unit starting to refresh the closet to a clean smell overnight. Excellent!!
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: We are on our 3rd and plan to order more.
customer_reviews.text: We are on our 3rd unit and plan to order more. We have 3 AirBNBs and use them so the property smells nice and fresh. They work great and are super quite. It is a fresh scent that everyone compliments about. Also if someone uses the kitchen it gets rid of the food odor. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Meador

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the 1/2 bath I keep my 2 kitty litter pans in, does a great job of transforming the air quality if/when it gets a little rank.
customer_reviews.author: dorie k.

customer_reviews.title: and I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: Only 5 days of use, and I like it very much, clean the air of my home and I feel very good with it. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Emma Walther

customer_reviews.title: Concerned
customer_reviews.text: Seems to have many warning about breathing O3 but I just turn it on when I leave the house for about 3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Seems to have rid the living room of dog and cat smells.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend buying this product. For only 20$ more you can get a MUCH higher quality ozone machine! This thing is a piece of junk! I got one and than it broke after two uses, got a replacement, and IT TO BROKE! DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.author: VaxilRae

customer_reviews.title: Clean
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Arrived on time, excellent packing. Works fast on strong smells.The timer is awesome because 30 minutes will clear out everything. Would strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SAM in G. A.

customer_reviews.title: Keeping room fresh
customer_reviews.text: The size the ability to handle the room and the fresh sent in the air.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Air Purifier that Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is better priced that one I got a mail offer for (another brand).
customer_reviews.author: Darryll E. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Odor is just vanish away
customer_reviews.text: Excellent excellent excellent excellent product I am very pleased great good
customer_reviews.author: DIANE Marie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Used it in a 130sq ft room and the odours still remain. Tried it several times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very low output.
customer_reviews.text: With a very low output if 50mg/h, this unit is very far from 'powerful'. Less than 0.01 ppm is really ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Worked to my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Product worked very well. I was laid up and forced to smoke in the house. Item eliminated the door to my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Anita C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Within a short time of using this the air smelled super fresh. We have 2 of them. One is near the cat box and has really helped rid the area of any smell.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Sonner

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Set it up in a hunting gear storage closet to keep clothing and gear scent free works great
customer_reviews.author: David Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great product that does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: I have one in each bathroom, one in the kitchen and another in our closet. They hold up well and the 30 minute timer function is a great alternative to spraying fragrance air fresheners.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Small

customer_reviews.title: This purifier is great. I hate the smell of cigarette smoke and ...
customer_reviews.text: This purifier is great. I hate the smell of cigarette smoke and my boyfriend smokes in our bedroom but I can't smell it all when I use this purifier. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lockett

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my doctor who uses one in her office. Easy to use and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: A.G.S.

customer_reviews.title: Cuts down on cat box odors very well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try to cut back on the odor from our cat litter boxes and it works very well. I leave it running all the time next to our six cat boxes and I seldom notice and odor anymore. Overall I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sergey Ivanovich Melnikov

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about the performance of the Ozone generator air purifier until I plugged into a outlet in a freshly painted room. It WORKS! It eliminated the smell of the paint in 30 minutes. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: BookCottage184

customer_reviews.title: Good timing
customer_reviews.text: I like the product because it has a timer and it works very well it just does have a heavy smell
customer_reviews.author: Monica Ortega-Porras

customer_reviews.title: Working perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for cleaning and refreshing air in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleared Closet Odor
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. I did think the timer function was user adjustable for more than one 30-minute operation. Still does what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Texas

customer_reviews.title: This little ionizer is great and have recommended to friends
customer_reviews.text: I bought the One Earth ionizer for my cats room. I change the litter frequently and scoop every other day. The room still had a tell tale odor. When I plugged my ionizer in and within 30 min. the room smelled normal with no odor of cat at all. I turn it about 5or6 times a day and you could never tell I had a cat. This little ionizer is great and have recommended to friends!!
customer_reviews.author: larry e. harms

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact Size Air Purifire
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I like it because you don’t have to buy replacement filters.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Superczynski

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can run this manually and that it is easily relocated.
customer_reviews.author: James Willoughby

customer_reviews.title: great price!!
customer_reviews.text: small but it does a great job cleaning the air
customer_reviews.author: emma 1

customer_reviews.title: Later please
customer_reviews.text: Please ask for this rating in 30 days when we have more time to see how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good job for s small unit
customer_reviews.text: It helps control odors, good job for s small unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ivonne O. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We had the perfect test on the day these arrived my wife had just boiled eggs and made egg salad. i plugged in the ozone units and turned on using timer and within the 30 minutes the oder was gone. Highly reccomend works well
customer_reviews.author: D. elliott

customer_reviews.title: The garage was larger than the quoted area and it worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and then some. I used it in a garage which had a smoke smell. The garage was larger than the quoted area and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: michael mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excelle nt product. High Quality. Inmediately you smell de difrence against other similar products. Highly recomend
customer_reviews.author: Mike DLVC

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t remove all odors
customer_reviews.text: I tried it in one bedroom in an older home that had that musty smell air fresheners or cleaning couldn’t remove. I used for over 12 hours without success unfortunately as I was really hoping it would so the trick. Maybe a larger unit is needed? There was a slight difference just not enough to make a noticeable difference.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product, But I don't like its when it's come to to empty room for 10-15 min to let ozone air out I know it's regarding to health issues and safety but doesn't new air comes with new Germs..etc too! I think it's suitable for bathrooms with exhaust.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

I have 2 kids and I don't know that it is good for them to breathe in and they are placed in large rooms.

customer_reviews.text: Love it. This product is just as powerful (in my opinion) as a full size unit. I would definitely recommend it! Also...love the 30 minute timer.

customer_reviews.title: I love the 30 minute timer
customer_reviews.text: Shipment arrived on-time. I love the 30 minute timer! I use this often in my bedroom. Takes care of the lingering smoke from my trips outside. Very quiet, there is a slight smell but its ok. Excellent product

product_meta.title: Ozone Generator Air Purifier: Ozone Machine for Home With 30 Minute Timer. Ozone Cleaner For Home, Work and Travel
feature_bullets: ODOR REMOVAL: Ozone generators are known to help remove odors. Each odor is different based on the environment, intensity and other variables. Ozone generators may help but complete odor removal may not happen.
SMALL AND POWERFUL: Ozone air purifier for home.
COVERAGE: Covers up to 500 square feet. Ideal for most rooms: bathroom, living room, bedrooms, etc.
Generador de Ozono. Ozono generador. ozono purificador de aire
